document.discussion_title: HOW TO INSTALL ADRIAN SPORTS KODI ADDON - YouTube
document.topic_text: The interactive transcript could not be loaded. Loading... Rating is available when the video has been rented. This feature is not available right now. Please try again later. Published on Apr 15, 2016 This is another Live Sports addon for KODI. The addon is a 3rd party addon made in the KODI Community repo.Manual download of the repoPlease watch all the guide to explain the process of how to use this addon incase you run in to trouble.Husham Memar
